Articles.Content:
Be an engineer for the Canuk Space Program: https://emploisfp-psjobs.cfp-psc.gc.ca/psrs-srfp/applicant/page1800?poster=1067972

I would hope that playing KSP would count for experience in the knowledge section. Specifically the following:
- Thermal for space
- Attitude Control
- Orbital Mechanics
- Communication Systems
- Space Structures
I can't help but feel that the physics of hockey and knowledge of a certain golden carbonated fuel fit in there somewhere.
